text.title: Amazon Smile
text: If you shop on Amazon, shop through Amazon Smile and sign up to support Friends of Texas Wildlife. For all eligible purchases, a portion of what you spend will be donated to us directly!

text.title: eBay Giving Works
text: Through eBay Giving Works, you can donate a percentage or the entirety of proceeds of whatever you sell on eBay to Friends of Texas Wildlife. What a great way to clean out your closets and help Friends at the same time!

text.title: Kroger Community Rewards
text: Kroger's Community Rewards program allows you to link favorite charities directly to your Kroger Plus card. A portion of everything you purchase will be donated back to Friends of Texas Wildlife.

text.title: Visit Our Shop
text: Support us by buying from our own online store! We have animals, plushies, apparel, and more!
